Name: BestCrypt
Hibernation file: yes{{cite web|url= Hard Disk Encryption Software - BestCrypt Volume Encryption - Jetico Inc. Oy|publisher=|access-date=2009-09-17|archive-url=

Name: Dm-crypt / LUKS
File: yesdm-crypt can encrypt a file-based volume when used with the losetup utility included with all major Linux distributions
Hibernation file: yesyes, but the user needs custom scripts:

Name: e-Capsule Private Safe
File: yesUses proprietary e-Capsule file system not exposed to the OS.

Name: FileVault
Swap space: yesnot technically part of FileVault, but provided by many versions of Mac OS X, can be enabled independently of FileVault

Name: GBDE
File: yesFile-based volume encryption is possible when used with mdconfig(8) utility.

Name: SafeGuard Easy
Hibernation file: Each sector on disk is encrypted

Name: SafeGuard Enterprise
Hibernation file: Each sector on disk is encrypted

Name: Softraid / RAID C
Swap space: yes (encrypted by default in OpenBSD) OpenBSD 3.8 change notes

Name: TrueCrypt
Whole disk: yeshowever, not Windows UEFI-based computers with a GUID partition table (GPT)
